snippet.title: PlayStation Experience 2015: Hob - PS4 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/hob-ps4/ 

Hob, a new IP from Runic Games, the studio behind the popular Torchlight series, brings you a world as beautiful as it is dangerous. Presented without text or narrative, you must fix the many mechanical puzzles upon which the world is built, heal it of the infection from the rogue life, and discover why you are the only one of your kind on this strange, unknown world.
